channel.title: Removing
channel.description: How do you remove things from quest tab? because when i go to client.java on the server side. and i delete it, it is still there. Is it on the client side?

item.title: Removing
item.dc:creator: @runescapeftw1234 runescapeftw1234
item.description:
@runescapeftw1234 wrote:

Oh, ok thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

runescapeftw1234:

How do you remove things from quest tab? because when i go to client.java on the server side. and i delete it, it is still there. Is it on the client side?

When you “remove it” you’re not actually removing it. For example removing something like

client.sendString("Quest Name", lineId);

from the code does nothing, because it’s set to a default value in the client (just like subtraction is really the adding of a negative number).

Instead, you need to set the line to a blank string.

Read full topic
